metadata.title: CVE-2021-47423 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/nouveau/debugfs: fix file release memory leakWhen using single_open() for opening, single_release() should becalled, otherwise the 'op' allocated in single_open() will be leaked.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
